attributes.action: STop the closure of the Deanes School, Thundersley
attributes.additional_details:
The Deanes School has been told that it is facing imminent closure due to the financial viability of the school since its government funding for a new school fell through.

Two neighbouring schools have been asked to co-operate and assist finding places for nearly 800 kids, putting there own infrastructure under severe stress.

The Deanes School was recently inspected by Ofsted and recieved a "good with outstanding" status, and is home to many outstanding teachers.

Not only that, 60% of students live nearby and walk to school and 95% of current students will have to travel an extra 4 miles to the nearest other school.

It is a good school that has been embroiled in financial mis-management stemming from a change of government. Help put a stop to it and show local government how much the area needs this school.
